short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Looks for the location footer (with id 'footcnt') on the Google search page and replaces it.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Browsing Google shows the computer's location (as inferred from the IP address). This is something people (particularly, streamers) might want to keep private, so as to avoid any issues.
